title: NAACP Image Awards, Michael B. Jordan Alexa, LBJ Courtside Karen and more.
itunes:title: NAACP Image Awards, Michael B. Jordan Alexa, LBJ Courtside Karen and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today our hearts are filled with nothing but gratitude. The Chief Love Officer must carefully advise an escort that is falling for her John. It's award season and Steve has been nominated for two NAACP Image Awards. Courtside Karen apologizes to LBJ. That Alexa Michael B. Jordan Superbowl ad had Tommy vocal. Your favorite play cousin Junior talks about Superbowl food because the Big Game is this Sunday. Uncle Steve will be hosting the NFL Honors for the 3rd consecutive year and it airs this Saturday, February 6th. Miss Carla talked about the aunties VS the nieces from RHOA in Reality Update. Today the show wraps up with Steve talking us through his nutritional journey and that 17%.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
